    Restrict the domain of a data attribute, often times to fulfill business rules/requirements.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example中RegionObserver的使用

      实现RegionObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) class  ExampleRegionObserverWithMetrics.ExampleRegionObserver 
      class  ScanModifyingObserver
      A RegionObserver which modifies incoming Scan requests to include additional columns than what the user actually requested.
      class  ValueRewritingObserver
      This RegionObserver replaces the values of Puts from one value to another on compaction.
      class  WriteHeavyIncrementObserver
      An example for implementing a counter that reads is much less than writes, i.e, write heavy.
      class  ZooKeeperScanPolicyObserver
      This is an example showing how a RegionObserver could configured via ZooKeeper in order to control a Region compaction, flush, and scan policy.
      返回变量类型为RegionObserver的类型的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Optional<RegionObserver> WriteHeavyIncrementObserver.getRegionObserver() 
      Optional<RegionObserver> ValueRewritingObserver.getRegionObserver() 
      Optional<RegionObserver> ExampleRegionObserverWithMetrics.getRegionObserver() 
      Optional<RegionObserver> ExampleRegionObserverWithMetrics.ExampleRegionObserver.getRegionObserver() 
      Optional<RegionObserver> ScanModifyingObserver.getRegionObserver() 
      Optional<RegionObserver> ZooKeeperScanPolicyObserver.getRegionObserver()
